title: for sale: Plow Boy cabinet of Block, White Sox
author: bcornell

posts.post_title: for sale: Plow Boy cabinet of Block, White Sox
posts.post_content:
Card has sold.  Thanks.

Plow Boys don't appear for sale often and when they do, the prices are usually $1K or more.  Here's an opportunity to purchase one for much less for this Plow Boy of Bruno Block, White Sox.  It has pinholes in 3 corners and larger tack holes at the top and bottom.  The player image and the back are clean.
 
You can PM me here or respond below if interested.  I'll ship it via Priority Mail.    Thanks.


[IMG]https://thetraderspeaks.com/new/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/plow_boy_block.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://thetraderspeaks.com/new/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/plow_boy_block_back.jpg[/IMG]
nice card and nice pickup for someones collection
